title: Abstract Art Vocabulary Concept Comprehension Using Transmodal Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic art appreciation and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized content for professionals to utilize outside of work hours.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain 10 core vocabulary terms—such as 'form', 'hue', and 'spatial depth'—in context-specific ways through abstract art analysis.
Learners can create a digital portfolio that combines image-text-sound modes to express abstract art concepts in a multidimensional manner.
Learners can perform a three-stage process (self-assessment → feedback acceptance → revision) to improve vocabulary comprehension based on peer feedback.

resources: Mobile App with Voice Recording Functionality
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
